act:
444140 THE U. P. SUGARCANE CESS (VALIDATION) REPEAL ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 17 OF 2001 [ 3rd August, 2001.]
An Act to repeal the U. P. Sugarcane Cess (Validation) Act, 1961.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
445830 1Short title.- This Act may be called the U. P. Sugarcane Cess (Validation) Repeal Act, 2001.
276306 2Repeal of Act 4 of 1961.- The U. P. Sugarcane Cess (Validation) Act, 1961 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
